Articles.Content: For some reason since the latest patch KSP crashes right before the main menu would load. I am using mods via CKAN but have uninstalled all the incompatible ones.  Any ideas?

Try running it with no mods at all - if it runs, it's a mod. If it still crashes, try reinstalling (could be corrupt download). If it still crashes after that, raise a bug report.

There was a change to the way the settings screens work with mods, so any mod written pre-1.3.1 which injects anything into the game settings causes the game to crash on startup until it's been updated.

Edited October 15, 2017 by micha
Text Clarification
